sections.text:
81-2251.Rules and regulations; state long-term care ombudsman; qualifications.

The department may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out the Long-Term Care Ombudsman Act. The department shall ensure that the state long-term care ombudsman has no conflicts of interest in fulfilling the duties of the office, is capable of administering the office impartially, has an understanding of long-term care issues, has experience in the fields of aging and health care, and has worked with and been involved in volunteer programs.

SourceLaws 1992, LB 677, ยง 15;Laws 2007, LB296, ยง 770;Laws 2018, LB903, ยง 15.
